info.name: TruckersMP Blue Accent V2 (Dark Theme)
info.description:
This style changes the TruckersMP website to a Blue accent, instead of Green.

Created by Digital (https://forum.truckersmp.com/index.php?/profile/4963-digital); edited by Joschi (https://forum.truckersmp.com/index.php?/profile/222408-joschi/)

Original: https://userstyles.org/styles/160348/truckersmp-red-accent-dark-theme
